text: Patrician IV is the first computer game from Gaming Minds Studios and part of the Patrician series. It is a game simulating trading, piracy, politics and economics. An expansion pack, Rise of a Dynasty, was released in April 2011. Originally the Patrician series was developed by Ascaron. Kalypso Media bought the licenses from the insolvent Ascaron company and formed Gaming Minds Studios. Patrician IV was one of the launch games for OnLive. ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Developer website * Patrician IV at MobyGames * Patrician IV Fansite Category:2010 video games Category:Games for Windows certified games Category:Historical simulation games Category:MacOS games Category:Trade simulation games Category:Video games developed in Germany Category:Video games set in the Middle Ages Category:Video games with expansion packs Category:Windows games
title: Patrician IV
